20101203034816.714|20101203034818.143|CCO|>> HEY.
20101203034818.143|20101203034819.571|CCO|>> HEY.
20101203034819.571|20101203034821.000|CCO|YOU'RE -- 
20101203034821.000|20101203034823.000|CCO|>> NAKED AND WAITING F

20101203034829.000|20101203034831.000|CCO|STRENGTH OF "GREY'S ANATOMY."
20101203034831.000|20101203034832.667|CCO|PATRICK DEMPSEY GREW UP IN MAINE
20101203034832.667|20101203034834.333|CCO|AND LEFT HIGH SCHOOL IN HIS 
20101203034834.333|20101203034836.000|CCO|SENIOR YEAR TO PURSUE ACTING.

20101203034837.667|20101203034839.333|CCO|SCHOOL BECAUSE
20101203034839.333|20101203034841.000|CCO|HE DECIDED THAT THE ONLY WAY TO 
20101203034841.000|20101203034843.500|CCO|FIX THAT WAS TO JOIN A CLOWN 
20101203034843.500|20101203034846.000|CCO|COLLEGE OR JOIN THE CIRCUS AND 
20101203034846.000|20101203034848.500|CCO|TAKE UP HIGH WIRE AND JUGGLING 
20101203034848.500|20101203034851.000|CCO|AND JUST MAKE SURE THAT PEOPLE 
20101203034851.000|20101203034853.000|CCO|KNEW HE WAS SOMETHING MORE THAN 
20101203034853.000|20101203034855.000|CCO|A SHORT KID.
20101203034855.000|20101203034857.000|CCO|HIS FIRST BIG BREAK IN TV WAS A
